message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its features and benefits. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000, which I believe is a fair and competitive offer.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you have a budget in mind, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm now offering the product to you for $11000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the value you've placed on the product.

I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $11000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $10500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $9750. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
